ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: (1). Vocational Training: - The organisation has done Vocational training centre at Kodompokpi Mamang Leikai and training of girls & women (youth) are given in embroidering, tailoring, wool knitting & weaving. Altogether 30 trainees have undergone 3 months training course in 3 batches during this year. Not only this we have also training on weaving & Agarbati making. For rural agriculture we have training on Mushroom plantation in which 25 trainees have been given training on line this years. (2) Fruit preservation training: - One week training course on Domestic Method of fruit & vegetable preservation conducted by community fruit & Nutrition Extension Unit, Imphal is done every year at Kodompokpi Mamang Leikai under the sponsorship of ministry of Human Resource Development (Department of women & Child Development, Food & Nutrition Board) , Gol . About 30 participants attended the programme. (3) Handicraft training Training on crafts is done,specially on making traditional ornaments made from indigenous reeds known as "kouna" and bamboos. About 36 women have undergone this training programme and after this training programme these people are capable of earning money for their livelihood. (4) SOCIAL SERVICE CAMP. The organization has done every year social service at the locality. During the camp, many Nalas (Drains), culverts were cleaned and plantation of 100 different trees were by the volunteers. (5) Creche Centre: - One Creche Centre has been running with 25 to 30 children at kodompokpi Mamang Leikai, lmphal. These children are usually for the working women who brought their children for keeping in the crÃ¨che centre. This year we have 25 children admitted in the Creche Centre. (6) Yoga and Naturopathy Awareness programme The organisation has been organising one day yoga and naturapathy every year.

ngoList.title: WRITERS FORUM IMPHAL
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Writers Forum Imphal is one of the five Literary Organisation recognized by Sahitya Akademi, New Delhi(National Academy of Letters ) in Manipuri Language.It was established on September3,1998 and registerd under Manipur Societies Registration Act,1989. Regd. No. 2121 of1990 Most of the literary figures in Manipur are its members. It has published 132 books. Many of the books won Sahitya Akademi Awards, Translation Prizes,State Kala Akademi Awards, Manipur State Award for literature(instityted by Govt. of Manipur). Its books also won many prestigious awards given by various literary organizatios viz. Manipuri Sahitya Parishad, Cultural Forum, Manipur, Naharol Sahitya Premee Samiti etc. Forum organized various national and state level Seminars, workshops,Symposiums, in collaboration with Sahitya Akademi, National Book Trust, CIIL, Mysore, Eastern Regional Language Centre, Bhubaneshwor,Federation of Indian Publishersetc. for the developement of Manipuri Literature & Culture,language, Tribal dialects, Book publication etc.from time to time. It published its quarterly literary journal- Sahityagi Pao- with RNI No.00273/04 and ISSN 2278-9006 since 1990. It also instituted an award - Khundongbam Brojendro Ningshing Mana- in recognition of works by playwrights.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Basanta Ras lila has been a popular theme in Bharatanatyam, Odissi, Manipur and Kuchipudi items Ras lila is a popular form of folk theatre in the regions of Mathura, Vrindavan in Uttar Pradesh, especially during the festivals of Krishna Janmashtami and Holi, and amongst various followers of Gaudiya Vaishnavism in the region. Raas leela is also observed as one of the National Festivals of Assam. During Raax lila, several thousand devotees visit the holy temples and extras of Assam every year

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: YOUTHS STEP FORWARD CENTRE, (YSFC), Wangjing Bazar, Manipur is a non profit making voluntary organisation in the field of Rural Development. And Registered under Societies Registration Act. of 1989 at th DCO Thoubal, bearing its registration no. 169 of 1997 dated 28/01/1997, having its Head Office at Wangjing Bazar, Manipur. Activities : We have implemented many Schemes/Projects for Health, Women and Child, Aged, Rural Development, Agriculture, Coaching for Minorities, Piggery and Poultry, Handloom Handicrafts, and Computer Training etc. for every year. Achievements : Moreover we have implemented few Schemes in the Rural areas say Construction of Vermicompost Pits, Bamboo Cultivation, Rail Water Harvesting Projects uner the financial assistance of CAPART NEZ Guwahati. benefited more than 500 families in the Thoubal District, Manipur.
